availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Board (Mercer County Circuit Court Clerk)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as the Mercer County Circuit Court clerk beginning in 1864. Served for twenty-four consecutive years as the court's clerk.

Spouse: C. Virginia Board
Children: Richard Board Jr., William Board

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 22.
The Interior Journal, "Newsy Notes," February 7, 1888, page 2.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 42.
